name: Drunkard's Dice
description:
Drunkard's Dice is a variation of Liar's Dice, which Will Turner and Davy Jones played in the Pirates of the Caribbean. You will play the game against randomized characters with randomly rolled dice. You can choose a two-person game or a four-person game. Try to last as long as you can. You can try to bluff your way to victory or call your opponent a "liar" if you think he is bluffing. The loser of the round has to drink a round. Beware, for the more you drink, the harder the game gets. Who will end up under the table, you or your opponent?

Made by Alex Gyzlov, Brendan Halstead, and Cy Pabis for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
